body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Open Card Explorer window
2. Mouse over Air Bladder (a new card) What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.29 on Debian Linux (Testing) 64 bit.
author: [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/)
title: 1.29 crashes in Card Explorer

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision 1b9d29b0f6ae .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body: Thanks, the url for the image was wrong. You can fix it in your copy by downloading the corrected card scripts from the following links and putting it in your Magarena/scripts folder. https://magarena.googlecode.com/hg-history/1b9d29b0f6ae0b35a41d3e3a983b60275a13aef9/release/Magarena/scripts/Air_Bladder.txt https://magarena.googlecode.com/hg-history/1b9d29b0f6ae0b35a41d3e3a983b60275a13aef9/release/Magarena/scripts/Horn_of_Ramos.txt https://magarena.googlecode.com/hg-history/1b9d29b0f6ae0b35a41d3e3a983b60275a13aef9/release/Magarena/scripts/Mox_Jet.txt
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body: Issue 294 has been merged into this issue.
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/) on August 28, 2012 19:17:54_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Open Card Explorer window
2. Mouse over Air Bladder (a new card) What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.29 on Debian Linux (Testing) 64 bit.

**Attachment:** [crash.log game.log](http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=283)

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=283_
